<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75285</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75285</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>21893109-daea-4613-a3b0-97cec97a6734#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Csigák</string>
            <string language="en">pulleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Riemenscheiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poulies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pulegge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροχαλίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">poleas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Állócsiga, mozgócsiga, csigasor, hengerkerék</string>
            <string language="en">standing pulley,  moving pulley,  pulley line, winding drum,  </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">egyszerű gépek,  Csiga,  állócsiga,  mozgócsiga,  csigasor,  hengerkerék,  </string>
            <string language="en">simple machines, pulley, standing pulley,  moving pulley,  pulley line, winding drum,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stehende Riemenscheibe, bewegliche Riemenscheibe, 
Riemenscheibe Zeile, Wicklung Trommel,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poulie debout, poulie mobile, ligne de poulie, 
tambour d'enroulement,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polia ereta, polia movente, linha da polia, 
cilindro do enrolamento,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">puleggia diritta, puleggia commovente, riga della
puleggia, tamburo di bobina,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόνιμη τροχαλία, κινούμενη τροχαλία, γραμμή 
τροχαλιών, άνεμος τύμπανο,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polea derecha, polea móvil, línea de la polea, 
tambor de la bobina,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfache Maschinen, Riemenscheibe, stehende 
Riemenscheibe, bewegliche Riemenscheibe, Riemenscheibe Zeile, Wicklung
Trommel,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">machines simples, poulie, poulie debout, poulie mobile,
ligne de poulie, tambour d'enroulement,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">máquinas simples, polia, polia ereta, polia movente, 
linha da polia, cilindro do enrolamento,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">macchine semplici, puleggia, puleggia diritta, puleggia
commovente, riga della puleggia, tamburo di bobina,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απλές μηχανές, τροχαλία, μόνιμη τροχαλία, κινούμενη 
τροχαλία, γραμμή τροχαλιών, άνεμος τύμπανο,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">máquinas simples, polea, polea derecha, polea móvil, 
línea de la polea, tambor de la bobina,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75285</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=21893109-daea-4613-a3b0-97cec97a6734&v=1&b=6</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
